scripts.prerelease: cross-env CI=true yarn clean && yarn --frozen-lockfile && yarn test && node scripts/prerelease.js
scripts.test: yarn build:runtime && yarn test:unit && yarn test:portfolio && yarn test:web
scripts.clean: lerna exec rimraf lib && lerna exec rimraf build && lerna exec rimraf dist && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/portfolio",
  "private": true,
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "The Skypager Framework Monorepo",
  "main": "index.js",
  "resolutions": {
    "eslint-scope": "3.7.1"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node scripts/start.js",
    "build": "node scripts/build.js",
    "build:runtime": "skypager run-all runtime/test runtime/build --sequential",
    "build:all": "lerna run build",
    "watch": "node scripts/watch.js",
    "prettify": "node scripts/prettify.js",
    "new": "skypager create",
    "link:devDependencies": "node scripts/link-dev-dependencies.js",
    "console": "node scripts/console.js",
    "prerelease": "cross-env CI=true yarn clean && yarn --frozen-lockfile && yarn test && node scripts/prerelease.js",
    "release": "lerna publish patch --yes",
    "postrelease": "node scripts/postrelease.js && yarn deploy",
    "deploy": "lerna run deploy --stream && yarn deploy:website",
    "deploy:website": "node scripts/deploy-website.js",
    "test": "yarn build:runtime && yarn test:unit && yarn test:portfolio && yarn test:web",
    "test:unit": "mocha",
    "pretest:web": "node scripts/prepare-web-release.js",
    "test:web": "CI=true skypager start-and-test --start start:test:webserver --test test:web:build",
    "test:portfolio": "lerna run test --stream",
    "test:web:build": "mocha --file test/test.js test/web/**/*.spec.js",
    "start:test:webserver": "skypager serve public --hostname localhost",
    "postinstall": "node scripts/postinstall.js",
    "clean": "lerna exec rimraf lib && lerna exec rimraf build && lerna exec rimraf dist && lerna clean --yes && rimraf node_modules",
    "quick": "yarn --ignore-scripts && yarn link:devDependencies"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "Skypager"
  ],
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "license": "MIT",
  "workspaces": [
    "src/apps/*",
    "src/clients/*",
    "src/devtools/*",
    "src/runtime",
    "src/runtimes/*",
    "src/features/*",
    "src/helpers/*",
    "src/examples/*",
    "src/servers/*"
  ],
  "devDependencies": {
    "better-docs": "^1.1.3",
    "cross-env": "^5.2.0",
    "husky": "^1.3.1",
    "jsdoc": "^3.5.5",
    "jsdoc-plugin-typescript": "^1.0.7",
    "jsdoc-to-markdown": "^4.0.1",
    "lerna": "^3.4.0",
    "lint-staged": "^7.3.0",
    "mocha": "^6.1.4",
    "patch-package": "^6.0.2",
    "puppeteer": "^1.15.0"
  },
  "lint-staged": {
    "src/**/*.{js,json}": [
      "node scripts/pre-commit.js"
    ]
  },
  "husky": {
    "hooks": {
      "pre-commit": "lint-staged"
    }
  },
  "contributors": [],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

_file.name: package

name: @skypager/apps-portfolio-browser
description: an api and application for browsing a portfolio
author: Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/apps-portfolio-browser",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "an api and application for browsing a portfolio",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "skypager": {
    "category": "apps",
    "projectType": "webapp",
    "buildFolder": "build",
    "webpack": {
      "localOnly": false
    },
    "externals": {
      "react": "React",
      "react-dom": "ReactDOM",
      "react-router-dom": "ReactRouterDOM",
      "@skypager/web": "skypager",
      "@skypager/runtime": "skypager",
      "semantic-ui-react": "semanticUIReact",
      "prop-types": "PropTypes"
    }
  },
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "predeploy": "skypager snapshot",
    "start": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production skypager serve --esm",
    "dev": "cross-env NODE_ENV=development skypager serve --esm --hot",
    "build": "skypager build --app-only --no-local-only",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "deploy": "node scripts/deploy.js --verbose",
    "watch": "skypager watch",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "pretest": "yarn build",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 10000"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "apollo-boost": "^0.1.23",
    "apollo-server": "^2.3.1",
    "apollo-server-express": "^2.3.1",
    "check-prop-types": "^1.1.2",
    "cookie-parser": "^1.4.3",
    "graphql": "^14.0.2",
    "graphql-schema-modules": "^0.0.3",
    "graphql-tools": "^4.0.3",
    "graphql-type-json": "^0.2.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.2",
    "react": "^16.5.2",
    "react-apollo": "^2.3.3",
    "react-dom": "^16.5.2",
    "react-hot-loader": "^4.3.11",
    "react-loadable": "^5.5.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.3.1",
    "react-semantic-ui-range": "^0.6.2",
    "react-treebeard": "^3.1.0",
    "semantic-ui-react": "^0.82.5"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not ie <= 11",
    "not op_mini all"
  ],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/cli",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "the skypager CLI",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "homepage": "https://skypager-cli.skypager.io",
  "license": "MIT",
  "main": "./lib/index.js",
  "module": "./lib/es/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "prebuild": "rimraf lib",
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:es",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel -d lib src --source-maps --comments",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "prepare": "yarn build",
    "test": "exit 0"
  },
  "bin": {
    "skypager": "./skypager-cli.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/register": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.3.1",
    "@skypager/helpers-repl": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/helpers-server": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/node": "^1.1.1",
    "chalk": "^2.4.2",
    "esm": "^3.0.84",
    "ink": "^2.0.0-17",
    "ink-big-text": "^1.0.1",
    "ink-box": "^1.0.0",
    "ink-gradient": "^1.0.0",
    "ink-select-input": "^3.0.2",
    "ink-spinner": "^3.0.0",
    "ink-text-input": "^3.0.0",
    "react": "^16.8.3"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "tools",
    "projectType": "cli",
    "buildFolder": "lib"
  }
}

{
  "name": "@skypager/portfolio-manager",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "the skypager portfolio manager",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "prebuild": "rimraf lib && yarn docs:api",
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:es",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel -d lib src --source-maps --comments",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "watch": "babel --watch --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "prepare": "yarn build",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js",
    "test:watch": "skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --watch"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/clients-npm": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/features-file-manager": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/features-module-manager": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/features-package-manager": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/node": "^1.1.1"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "buildFolder": "lib",
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js",
      "scopeModules": false
    },
    "category": "tools",
    "projectType": "feature"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

name: @skypager/sheets-monorepo
description: sync your packages with google spreadsheets.
author: Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>

_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/sheets-monorepo",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "sync your packages with google spreadsheets.",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "console": "skypager sync --console",
    "update:sheet": "skypager sync",
    "update:local": "skypager sync --inbound",
    "build": "exit 0",
    "test": "exit 0"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-sheet": "^1.1.1"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "category": "cli",
    "projectType": "example",
    "sheetTitle": "skypager-monorepo"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

{
  "name": "@skypager/runnable-mdx-example",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "skypager runnable mdx example",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-helpers-document.min.js",
  "react-native": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "skypager build && yarn bundle:mdx",
    "console": "node ./start.js --console",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "start": "NODE_ENV=production NO_CLEAR=true node ./start.js --log-level debug --cors",
    "dev": "NODE_ENV=development NO_CLEAR=true node ./start.js --hot --log-level debug --cors",
    "test": "node ./test.js",
    "bundle:mdx": "skypager bundle-mdx --no-prefix",
    "demo": "skypager test-code-blocks README.md --test-helpers @skypager/devtools/testing/mocha-test-setup",
    "postdemo": "yarn dev --open"
  },
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-document": "^1.0.1",
    "@skypager/node": "^1.0.1",

  },

  },
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "gitHead": "66f2da16f4d6ebc315f1d244ba314647a8630011",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "apps",
    "projectType": "webapp",
    "buildFolder": "lib",
    "webpack": {
      "externals": {
        "react": "React",
        "react-dom": "ReactDOM",
        "react-router-dom": "ReactRouterDOM",
        "@skypager/runtime": "skypager",
        "@skypager/web": "skypager",
        "prop-types": "PropTypes",
        "@skypager/helpers-document": "SkypagerHelpersDocument",
        "@skypager/helpers-document/lib/skypager-document-editor": "SkypagerEditor"
      },
      "copy": {
        "@skypager/helpers-document": [
          "lib/skypager-helpers-document.js",
          "lib/skypager-document-editor.js",
          "lib/skypager-document-editor.min.js",
          "lib/skypager-helpers-document.min.js"
        ],
        "@skypager/web": [
          "lib/skypager-runtimes-web.min.js",
          "lib/skypager-runtimes-web.js"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not ie < 11",
    "not op_mini all"
  ]
}

name: @skypager/ui-copy-manager
description: sync your ui copy with google spreadsheets.
author: Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/ui-copy-manager",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "sync your ui copy with google spreadsheets.",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "console": "skypager sync --console",
    "update:sheet": "skypager sync",
    "update:local": "skypager sync --inbound",
    "test": "exit 0",
    "build": "skypager build",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "start": "NODE_ENV=production NO_CLEAR=true node ./start.js --log-level debug --cors",
    "dev": "NODE_ENV=development NO_CLEAR=true node ./start.js --hot --log-level debug --cors",
    "test:walkthrough": "cross-env GCLOUD_PROJECT=skypager-4dab8 skypager test-code-blocks WALKTHROUGH.md --test-helpers @skypager/devtools/testing/mocha-test-setup"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-sheet": "^1.1.1"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "category": "cli",
    "sheetTitle": "skypagerUiCopyManager",
    "projectType": "webapp",
    "buildFolder": "lib",
    "webpack": {
      "externals": {
        "react": "React",
        "react-dom": "ReactDOM",
        "react-router-dom": "ReactRouterDOM",
        "@skypager/runtime": "skypager",
        "@skypager/web": "skypager",
        "prop-types": "PropTypes"
      },
      "copy": {
        "@skypager/web": [
          "lib/skypager-runtimes-web.min.js",
          "lib/skypager-runtimes-web.js"
        ]
      }
    }
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not ie <= 11",
    "not op_mini all"
  ]
}

scripts.deploy: cp deploy.json lib/package.json && cd lib && now --npm && now alias

{
  "name": "@skypager/features-browser-vm",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "a vm for running scripts in a jsdom context",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "registryAccess": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "prebuild": "rimraf lib && yarn docs:api",
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:es",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel -d lib src --source-maps --comments",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "watch": "babel --watch --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "prepare": "yarn docs:api && yarn build",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "jsdom": "^13.2.0"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "features",
    "projectType": "feature"
  },
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

{
  "name": "@skypager/features-file-manager",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "an observable state machine for a projects files",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "prepare": "yarn build",
    "prebuild": "rimraf lib",
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:es",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel -d lib src --source-maps --comments",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "postbuild:es": "yarn docs:api",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs --no-verify",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 30000"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js"
    },
    "category": "features",
    "projectType": "feature",
    "providesScripts": false,
    "apiDocs": [
      "src/features/file-manager",
      "src/features/package-manager",
      "src/features/module-manager"
    ]

    "skywalker": "^0.3.2"
  },

  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

_file.name: package
_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/helpers-document",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "skypager document helper",
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-helpers-document.min.js",
  "react-native": "lib/index.js",
  "scripts": {
    "prebuild": "rimraf lib",
    "build": "yarn build:node && yarn build:es && skypager run-all build:web build:editor",
    "build:node": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "build:web": "skypager build --app-only --no-clean --include-unminified",
    "build:editor": "skypager build --app-only --app-entry src/editor --no-clean --include-unminified --library-name=SkypagerEditor --app-name skypager-document-editor",
    "watch:web": "skypager watch --app-only --no-clean --include-unminified",
    "watch:editor": "skypager watch --app-only --app-entry src/editor --library-name=SkypagerEditor --no-clean --include-unminified --app-name skypager-document-editor",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha test/**/*.spec.js",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "prepare": "yarn build"
  },
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/core": "^7.2.2",
    "@babel/generator": "^7.2.0",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.2.2",
    "@babel/template": "^7.2.2",
    "@babel/traverse": "^7.2.5",
    "@babel/types": "^7.2.2",
    "@skypager/helpers-mdx": "^1.1.1",
    "brace": "^0.11.1",
    "react-ace": "^6.3.2",
    "unified": "^7.0.0",
    "unist-util-find-after": "^2.0.2",
    "unist-util-find-all-after": "^1.0.2",
    "unist-util-find-all-before": "^2.0.2",
    "unist-util-find-before": "^2.0.2",
    "unist-util-select": "^2.0.0",
    "unist-util-visit": "^1.4.0"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "helpers",
    "projectType": "helper",
    "buildFolder": "lib",
    "providesScripts": [
      "generate-api-docs",
      "test-code-blocks",
      "inspect-docs"
    ],
    "externals": {
      "react": "React",
      "react-dom": "ReactDOM"
    },
    "webpack": {
      "appName": "skypager-helpers-document",
      "libraryName": "SkypagerHelpersDocument"
    }
  },
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not ie < 11",
    "not op_mini all"
  ]
}

    "build:node": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "build:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "smoke-test": "skypager smoke-test",
    "test": "skypager test --timeout 10000 --mocha",
    "console": "skypager console"
  },
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "cheerio": "^1.0.0-rc.2",
    "sketchapp-json-flow-types": "^0.3.4"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "helpers",
    "projectType": "helper",
    "providesScripts": false
  }
}

_file.content:
{
  "name": "@skypager/runtime",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "universal javascript application runtime",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-runtime.min.js",
  "react-native": "lib/skypager-runtime.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "yarn build:lib && yarn build:web",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "build:web": "skypager build --app-only --no-clean --include-unminified",
    "prepare": "yarn docs:api && yarn build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/polyfill": "^7.2.2",
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.2.2",
    "lodash": "^4.17.4",
    "mobx": "3.3.1",
    "uuid": "^3.0.1",
    "vm-browserify": "^1.1.0"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "apiDocs": [
      "src/runtime",
      "src/helpers/helper",
      "src/helpers/feature",
      "src/features/profiler",
      "src/features/vm",
      "src/registries/*",
      "src/utils/*"
    ],
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js",
      "appName": "skypager-runtime",
      "libraryName": "skypager",
      "babelPolyfill": true,
      "babel": {
        "lodash": false
      }
    },
    "category": "runtimes",
    "projectType": "runtime"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "browserslist": [
    ">0.2%",
    "not dead",
    "not ie < 11",
    "not op_mini all"
  ],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

name: @skypager/lambda
description: the skypager lambda runtime, offers a slimmed down node runtime for use in lambda like environments
author: Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>

{
  "name": "@skypager/lambda",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "the skypager lambda runtime, offers a slimmed down node runtime for use in lambda like environments",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "lib/index.js",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "build": "rimraf lib && babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "docs:api": "skypager generate-api-docs",
    "watch": "babel --watch --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "console": "skypager console",
    "prepare": "yarn docs:api && yarn build",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js",
    "test:watch": "skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --watch"
  },
  "license": "MIT",
  "dependencies": {
    "@skypager/helpers-client": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/runtime": "^1.1.1",
    "bluebird": "^3.5.0",
    "child-process-promise": "^2.2.1",
    "find-up": "^2.1.0",
    "fs-extra-promise": "^0.4.1",
    "micromatch": "^3.1.4",
    "mime": "^2.4.0",
    "minimatch": "^3.0.3",
    "minimist": "1.2.0",
    "semver": "^5.3.0"
  },
  "skypager": {
    "webpack": {
      "build": "webpack.config.js",
      "scopeModules": false
    },
    "category": "runtimes",
    "projectType": "runtime"
  },
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io"
}

{

scripts.build:lib: cross-env BUILD_ENV=build NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src

{
  "name": "@skypager/react",
  "version": "1.1.1",
  "description": "",
  "author": "Jon Soeder <jon@chicago.com>",
  "main": "index.js",
  "module": "lib/es/index.js",
  "browser": "lib/skypager-runtimes-react.min.js",
  "license": "MIT",
  "publishConfig": {
    "access": "public"
  },
  "scripts": {
    "start": "skypager serve",
    "build": "rimraf build && yarn build:lib && yarn build:web && cp -r lib build",
    "postbuild": "skypager hash-build",
    "build:es": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src",
    "build:lib": "cross-env BUILD_ENV=build NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src",
    "watch:lib": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src --watch",
    "build:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js",
    "watch:web": "cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js --watch",
    "prepare": "yarn build",
    "test": "skypager test --mocha --timeout 10000 test/**/*.spec.js",
    "test:watch": "skypager test --webpack-config webpack.config.test.js --watch"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "@babel/runtime": "^7.3.1",
    "@skypager/features-browser-vm": "^1.1.1",
    "@skypager/runtime": "^1.1.1",
    "prop-types": "^15.6.2",
    "react": "^16.7.0",
    "react-dom": "^16.7.0",
    "react-router-dom": "^4.3.1"
  },
  "repository": {
    "type": "github",
    "url": "https://github.com/skypager/skypager"
  },
  "homepage": "https://skypager.io",
  "gitHead": "9392473e420c7a46eb0be31bc7739ca16c8eb130",
  "keywords": [],
  "contributors": [],
  "skypager": {
    "category": "runtimes",
    "projectType": "runtime",
    "buildFolders": [
      "lib",
      "build"
    ]
  }
}

scripts.build:lib: cross-env BUILD_ENV=build NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib src
scripts.build:es: cross-env BUILD_ENV=build-es NODE_ENV=production babel --comments --source-maps -d lib/es src
